definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
Hui person/member of Hui ethnic group living across China

sentences.english: During this period of 6 years, he quelled the nationalities' Risingup in Yunnan successfully.
sentences.chinese: 其間，他成功地鎮壓了滇東北各族人民起義。

sentences.english: This was probably the first time the Britons came into contact with other peoples.
sentences.chinese: 這或許是不列顛人第一次同外族人進行交往。

sentences.english: Kamba men are mainly farmers and are not a danger to elephants.
sentences.chinese: 而坎巴族人多爲農夫，因此對象羣沒有威脅。

sentences.english: It's clear the Chukchi were much more aggressive and stronger.
sentences.chinese: 很明顯楚克其族人更具攻擊性，更強壯。

sentences.english: Today, many Burmese view China as a pillager of resources.
sentences.chinese: 如今，許多緬族人都把中國看做是一個資源掠奪者。

sentences.english: Inside the gate is the Xiangtang Hall, where family members commemorate the ancestors or hold meetings.
sentences.chinese: 穿過門廳就是“享堂”，是族人祭祖議事的地方。

sentences.english: The central bank has plans to release a set of coins commemorating the Seediq.
sentences.chinese: 中央銀行計劃發佈一套紀念賽德克族人的硬幣。

sentences.english: Out achievements over the past five years are attributed to the concerted efforts of the whole Party and the people of all ethnic groups.
sentences.chinese: 五年來的成就，是全黨全國各族人民共同奮鬥的結果。

sentences.english: Mongols live in Mongolia autonomous region. They like wrestling.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古族人居住在內蒙古自治區，喜歡摔跤。

sentences.english: The term BPM-folks refers to the people that focus on process modelling.
sentences.chinese: “BPM族人”是指那些專注過程建模的人。

sentences.english: The Ling Ling brings the green wooden clansman to disperse immediately and enter into the city.
sentences.chinese: 林林帶衆綠色木族人頓時分散開來，投入城內。

sentences.english: JAKE and NEYTIRI stand before the gathered members of ANOTHER CLAN.
sentences.chinese: 傑克和奈提莉站在另一部落聚集的族人面前。

sentences.english: National Day is warmly celebrated on October 1 by the Chinese people of all nationalities every year.
sentences.chinese: 我國各族人民每年都要熱烈慶祝十月一日國慶節。

sentences.english: Funnily enough, most Akei are immune to bee stings.
sentences.chinese: 有趣的是，很多的Akei族人對蜜蜂的叮咬免疫。

sentences.english: Chapter Three analyzes the names'transformation of Mongolian people in Naiman Banner and discuss the reasons.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，分析了奈曼旗蒙古族人名變化情況及其原因。

sentences.english: Our people had not seen white men before. We thought they were sprites.
sentences.chinese: 我輩族人之前從未見過白人，還誤以爲他們是鬼魂。

definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
primogenitor/founder of a school or trade
